error.asset-not-depositable-error: Asset {{asset}} seems to not be depositable via {{domain}}
error.asset-not-withdrawable-error: Asset {{asset}} seems to not be withdrawable via {{domain}}
error.bad-transaction-error: Bad transaction given. Expected a Transaction or TransactionRecord, but got: {{transaction}}
error.expected-json-response-error: Expected {{url}} to return a JSON response. Content type was {{contentType}} instead.
error.existing-account-error: An account with that name does already exist.
error.fetch-account-data-error: Cannot fetch account data of {{account}} from {{horizon}}
error.low-reserve-order-error: Cannot place order because spendable XLM balance is too low.
error.memo-already-specified-error: Cannot set a custom memo. Federation record of {{destination}} already specifies memo.
error.missing-info-error: Cannot create transaction, because {{transferServer}} did not send all required information.
error.no-callback-url-error: Cannot submit back to multi-signature service. Signature request has no callback URL set.
error.non-existent-destination-error: Cannot pay in {{assetCode}}, since the destination account does not exist yet. Account creations always need to be done via XLM.
error.password-required-error: Account {{accountName}} is password-protected, but no password was passed.
error.submission-failed-error: Submitting transaction to {{endpoint}} failed with status {{status}}: {{message}}
error.testnet-endpoint-not-available-error: {{service}} does not provide a testnet endpoint.

submission-error.default: Transaction rejected by the network. Error code(s): {{codes}}
submission-error.internal-server-error: The server had trouble processing this request. Please try again.

op-result-code.op_cross_self: The order would counter an open order of yours.
op-result-code.op_has_sub_entries: Account still has trustlines (assets) or open trading orders.
op-result-code.op_line_full: The destination account's balance would exceed the destination's trust in the asset.
op-result-code.op_low_reserve: Transaction rejected by the network. Source or destination account balance would be below minimum balance.
op-result-code.op_no_issuer: Asset is invalid. Incorrect asset issuer.
op-result-code.op_no_trust: Destination account does not trust the asset you are attempting to send.
op-result-code.op_self_not_allowed: Account cannot trust assets issued by itself.
op-result-code.op_underfunded: Not enough funds to perform this operation.

tx-result-code.insufficient_fee: Network demands higher fees than set in the transaction.
tx-result-code.internal_error: An unknown error occured on the Stellar server.
tx-result-code.tx_bad_auth: Too few valid signatures or wrong network.
tx-result-code.tx_bad_seq: Sequence number mismatch. Please re-create the transaction.
tx-result-code.tx_insufficient_balance: Insufficient balance. Balance would fall below the minimum reserve.
tx-result-code.tx_too_late: Transaction draft has expired. Try again.

submission-error.timeout: The server did not respond. Please try again.

success.third-party: Waiting for authorization of third-party service
